content.label: Would love to see better naming conventions for each bill.  Also it takes few tries to get the scanning to work correctly
Dodge this bill splitting app. Poor UI and UX. Impossible to edit values. Uninstalled.

title.label: Great app, bad UI / Venmo integration

content.label:
The app does what it says and makes it easy. 

The Venmo integration is a key reason I downloaded it, and it hasn‚Äôt worked since I got the app. 

The UI is very odd. I think it‚Äôs trying to be super modern, but the buttons are impossible to click, at least on my iPhone. I‚Äôll click close 10 times before it registers.
This app has great potential but ever since I‚Äôve downloaded this app the Venmo connection has never worked.
This is then best thing that ever happened to me . So easy to use with no back and forth computation , complications and disagreements. Here is my part of the bill . Bye! Yaaaay

App doesn‚Äôt process receipt correctly. Tried several times. Each time was different result. Doesn‚Äôt tabulate bills correctly either. Never should launch an app if it doesn‚Äôt do what u advertise.

I have used similar bill splitting apps in the past but this is light years ahead of everything!  I am so impressed!  It would be nice to have MORE integration with other payment tools other than Venmo AND allow each person to use a different form of payment.  Also, include an ‚Äòexpensing‚Äô option so that if work is reimbursing the meal, you can exclude items they do not allow (eg. alcohol, etc).  Great programming!!

This app is so much more intuitive than Splitwise but its Venmo integration has been broken for a very long time, which makes it hard to recommend to people. Is there a plan to fix this? Is this app in active development? Bill-splitting is such a common problem, it‚Äôs baffling our options for it are so lackluster. Hope you resolve this soon.

Been using it for years and is great for splitting annoying bills. My only feedback would be that it would be great if you specify quantity per user on items. All that said, this is amazing as a Free app and props to the developers for never pushing any ads. Would pay for this app tbh
Fast and efficient way to cover only your share!  No more uneasiness or guesswork.

Excellent app. OCR is top-notch and each step of the process is easy to use and easy to edit. The ability to split individual items amongst multiple people is easy and super useful. Couldn't recommend more!

Amazing app, makes it very simple and easy to split the bill and has some neat stuff added on! 

Hoping for the Venmo connection to be fixed soon!
This app has takes away the hassle of having to split bills. So easy to use.
Highly recommend!!
If there is a way to switch currencies, it‚Äôs not obvious to me. Would be great to have this included in an update. Otherwise I love the ease and conscience of this app!
This app makes it so easy for me to split bills for restaurants to grocery bills it is a very convenient tool for me
Amazing app that I have loved for years BUT it has never connected to Venmo. I would seriously love for that to be fixed and for another integration to be added with Splitwise- that would be amazing
It‚Äôs freaking amazing
Great for the most part, except Venmo won‚Äôt connect to the app. It just leads me to a blank screen with two circles and two buttons, but clicking the ‚Äúallow‚Äù button doesn‚Äôt do anything.

i might need to find a better app for this sorta thing. the auto complete from a photo is suuuuper hit or miss. mostly misses if i‚Äôm honest to where it‚Äôs easier to manually enter it in. even then. at the end i can‚Äôt change the tax amount on my own which is annoying. it also doesn‚Äôt make it easy to split the tip evenly. it splits the tip based of percentage per amount spend which is fine‚Ä¶ if i wanted to do that.

Ever since I downloaded the app, it keeps telling me that venmo is ‚Äútemporarily‚Äù not available. Temporarily in this case means always. If you can‚Äôt make it work, why are you setting the expectations that there is a possibility to connect to venmo?
I use the app frequently with friends and it never fails!
I have used this app for over 10 yrs and I absolutely love it. My friends always tell me to use it when we go out and it makes life so much easier. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

title.label: Is there a setting to change the tax rate?

content.label: I don‚Äôt think tax is always 18% it could vary.
When I take a picture, it‚Äôs not accurate

title.label: Great but one issue never fixed

content.label: Love the app. It makes splitting receipts  quick and easy. however, I have this issue with the short character limit for names, and another issue is that if the app gets the name of an item wrong on the receipt, it doesn‚Äôt allow me to change it for some reason I‚Äôm not able to delete any of the characters to fix the name. I‚Äôve had this problem for the longest time, but they‚Äôve never seem to fix it

We just tried this today to split a bill for 12 people among 4 people. Everyone was impressed! Love that this really solves an everyday kind of situation! However, it mentioned an "unclaimed amount" and we had no way to easily see which item it was so I just ate up that cost. Also, I couldn't see a way to see the capture of the actual bill to confirm some things.
Wish this app was around back when I was younger and went out in large groups.  Super convenient!
S√∫per user friendly perfect for splitting checks. Always recommend to everyone I know

The whole reason I downloaded this app is because it advertised simple Venmo support so I wouldn‚Äôt have to manually request everyone. However this option still does not work after months and there seems to be no motivation to make it work.

title.label: Inability to manually change tax amount.

content.label: Incorrect tax amount without the ability to change it. My receipt lists tax as $1.54 but the app keeps trying to charge $4.62. There‚Äôs no way to manually change it either, just the tip amount.

I do bulk grocery shopping with friends and family. Im looking for an easy way to snap a picture of bill , select who‚Äôs expense and it tally up the cost.
This is almost what I need but geared more towards splitting restaurant bills.
It would be nice if there was an option to select what type of bill you want to split and also  if the members /names can be saved. Overall a great concept and easy to use

Love the concept of the app but it always gets confused when adding the subtotals and tips. It‚Äôll have a random crazy price that‚Äôs no where near what we your bill is. It should allow us to manually make changes to the taxes and tips portion of the bill
Would be perfect if that happened!

title.label: Simple app! A must for anybody under the age of 40!

content.label: Easy to use interface, and somehow now makes picking up the tab, and dividing later, not an enormous chore.

title.label: Honestly great for a free app

content.label: For being free, this app is great. Sure, it has its quirks. I put my hand/napkin over anything on the receipt that shouldn‚Äôt be in the picture. I also don‚Äôt use the Venmo integration. But it is so easy to split items and quickly tell who owes what. Very impressed, use it all the time.

Love the app!! Overall a 4.9/5 for me, there were certain parts of the process that weren‚Äôt so obvious at first but could easily be figured out by revisiting. For example, The item assignment for claiming bill items. Upon arriving at the final page to pay, I realized items were unclaimed as it wasn‚Äôt entirely obvious in the moment. Finding a way to make it obvious the first iteration would be awesome, but that‚Äôs a difficult design question.

Other aspects were related to the Venmo integration having issues, but that‚Äôs prob just a backend integration issue.
This could‚Äôve been the best app ever but the fact that you take the subtotal before tax and add the tip percentage and THEN you add tax is stupid. the tax should be before the tip.
Great interface and easy to navigate, but there are serious issues with pulling a receipt photo from your gallery and reading it.
Intuitive interface. Great for splitting bills.
The app is great. I haven't had any issues with adding amounts or food items, and it seems very intuitive most of the time too, but we need the Venmo integration back ASAP!

title.label: Downloaded this not knowing it would be a true game changer!!

content.label: This app is very easy to use once you understand what clicking on certain things does. It made splitting a large bill with family so super easy! I am obsessed. Will be sharing with friends and family from now on. Working in restaurant industry has made me really appreciate how this functions.

title.label: Better than all other bill splitting apps

content.label: I recently was asked to try Plates when I was out with a party of 13. The app is pretty, but when it comes to functionality and splitting checks, Tab is the best. Take a photo and it will automatically note all of the dishes and $$. I love that you can add people to the bill, not just random plates (looking at you Plates). Would highly recommend Tab to anyone going out with large parties where you need to split the check üòé
I‚Äôm not able to add the taxes

title.label: This app is a must have

content.label:
Rarely do I write reviews. This app has likely saved me money (of me missing a few dollars/cents trying to figure out this math on my own) and so many headaches splitting bills of large groups at restaurants that do not want to take the time to do separate checks. 

Over time, I have actually found it easier to just use this app rather than asking the server to do separate checks. In my experience with Tab, if you‚Äôre willing to do the work of figuring out who got what yourself, your servers get the order right, your food comes quicker (since they don‚Äôt have to spend a long time at the computer typing everything in carefully), and it makes the experience for the group better as a whole. 

A few feature suggestions:

Appetizers: A conversation that tends to come up when deciding who got what is ‚Äúwell this person are more of this than this person.‚Äù Can you create a way to say ‚Äúthis person had 4 of 12 items from this‚Äù instead of splitting it 12 ways and tapping it four times? Technically the app does this, but it requires a bit of extra taps. 

Alcohol: Guests may feel it‚Äôs appropriate to tip more for elaborate cocktails than they would for a pizza. Servers also tip out the bartender. Is there a way to figure out how to skew tips up based on how much of the bill was alcohol? For example, 15% for the food, 20% for the alcohol.

title.label: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED!!

content.label: So so so cool!!! So useful and everyone needs this! Put the bill on one persons card and EASILY Venmo the exact amount of your meal!
I love tab but it no longer works with Venmo so it‚Äôs not as useful as it used to be.
Adding incorrectly, total always wrong
The Venmo connection options doesn‚Äôt work
Does exactly what it needs to do quickly
